title: The Meddlesome Dia-san
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Haaah~, I’m so tired....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, I’m sorry for the troubles Ruby has caused you. She kept saying that she wanted to talk to you, Mia-san, so I think she got too excited.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It’s not like this will be the last time. She can talk to me whenever, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you very much. I’m sure Ruby will be happy to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>....Are you always helping Ruby out like this, Dia?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh? No, I’m not. There are many times that Ruby has helped me out too. You also have an older sister, right, Mia-san? I’m sure you understand.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>....I guess, but I don’t see her often. She probably already forgot about me. She’s always so busy with work, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s not possible!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Uwaaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No matter how little you meet or how far apart you are, no big sister in the world would ever forget about their little sister!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>O-, okay, okay! I get it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>....*Gasp*! Mia-san, did you say that just now because you were homesick....? That’s not good. Please, come to our house. Ruby and I will help you forget about your homesickness. Come on, we’re going!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>W-, wait! I’m not homesick! Wait, Diaaa-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
